price: Готово да се од тога небеса распадну, а Земља провали и планине здробе,
arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِنۡهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلۡجِبَالُ هَدًّا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: takādu al-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min'hu watanshaqqu al-arḍu watakhirru al-jibālu haddan
